select
from t_user where user_type != 0 order by create_date desc

select
from t_user where user_type != 0
and (nick_name like concat('%', #{userBean.userName},'%') or user_name like concat('%', #{userBean.userName},'%') or phone like concat('%', #{userBean.userName},'%') or account_name like concat('%', #{userBean.userName},'%'))
and user_type =#{userBean.userType,jdbcType=INTEGER}
and gender = #{userBean.gender,jdbcType=INTEGER}
and is_vip = 1
and is_spread = 1
order by create_date desc
